ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, I think there are two types of clerics - those that want to play more tank/clerics and those like myself that are striving for the pure
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, I think there are two types of clerics - those that want
to play more tank/clerics and those like myself that are striving for
the pure caster/cleric. I, personally, would choose a +3 wis AC 0
piece over an AC6 piece that had no wisdom. Hell, I've already done
it several times. :)

But not everyone wants that. I think Verant should recognize that
people that play clerics may strive for one of the two extremes, and
let us make the decision for what kind of cleric we want to play. I
agree that this armor is worthless, since the +wis is so rare. Unless
it changes, I will only get the pieces that are +wis. For me, the AC
is a moot point.


>From: "Anne O" <topaaz1@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Sit-in
>Date: Tue, 30 Nov 1999 11:37:17 EST
>
>here here, well said Jeff, i agree i want more wisdom. i refuse to do the
>quests, as far as im concerned AAC is useless to me in comparison to the
>wisdom i need, legs with intel=rediculas!!! plain and simple.....
>topaaz
>xegony
